mema awasthawata bandhanagara komasaris janaral ti.em.je.dab. thennakon mahatha, walikada jeshta bandhanagara adhikari ti.ayi. uduwara mahatha, bandhanagara adhikari (karmantha) em.ef. lahir mahatha, sahakara bandhanagara adhikari (karmantha) wasantha kumara dep mahatha saha da lawar asasaris pudgalika samagame kalamanakarana adhyaksha pi.ji.aar perera mahatha athulu pirisak sahabhagi wiya.
